title: Android default print service never finds network printer (brother DCP-L2550DW).
content: Default print service perpetually searching.  Network printer is found by all other devices on the network, including iMacs, iPhones, iPads, Linux desktop, Linux laptop, other Android phones and tablets, and windows laptops.  IP address of printer in pixel chrome browser opens the printer web interface. Brother print service, default print service, and cloud print are all on.
